entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 6:31 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
